channel.title: My source/client wont load re-post
channel.description:
[b]NOTE- I HAVE JDK VERSION 7, I DOWNLOADED THE "WINDOWS X86 VERSION BUT I CHECK ON MY COMPUTER PROPERTIES AND IT SAID 64-BIT OPERATING SYSTEM. SO SHOULD I UNINSTALL THE X86 VERSION AND DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS X64 VERSION? (http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk-7u1-download-513651.html) - ALSO INSTEAD OF USING WINRAR I USED WINZIP. - MY COMPUTER MANUFACTER IS TOSHIBA -WINDOWS EDITION : WINDOWS VISTA HOME PREMIUM[/b]
1.) ok i looked on google and found a good guide (i belive) http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/make-rsps-603179/ (not to be advatising) ok once you looked on the site and see what i see. you will understand better. i did exactly what it said on the site except for portforwarding and doing the no-ip thingy. but i download the source testscape and i copy and paste the information provided on the site exactly on the testscape compile and runeserver. i clicked on edit and paste exactly what was on the site. but when i did all that my source wouldnt work... when i double click on compile this is what i get "Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594"
this is what i edited inside of compile "@echo off title ArmyNation color 3b "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\java.exe" server pause"
2.) also i download client source "testscape" that was on the site also and when i double click on source this is what i get "Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594"
this is what i edited inside on "runserver" "@echo off title ArmyNation color 3b "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\java.exe" server pause"
[b](EXCEPT NOW I EDITED SOME OF THE INFORMATION INSIDE THE SOURCE/CLIENT FILE. SO IT NOT EXACTLY THE SAME AS ON THE SITE)[/b]
PLEASE HELP!!

item.title: My source/client wont load re-post
item.dc:creator: @oh_no1 oh_no
item.description:
@oh_no1 wrote:

Go to the right section.

Read full topic

item.title: My source/client wont load re-post
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

ok i download jdk 6 u25
now i get this error…

when i click on compile this is what i get.
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594"

and on “runserver” this is what i get
“Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?”

this is what it looks like inside of compile
“@echo off
title ArmyNation
color 3b
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\jre\bin\java.exe” server
pause”

this is what it looks like inside of “runserver”
“@echo off
title ArmyNation
color 3b
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\jre\bin\java.exe” server
pause”

PLEASE HELP!!

Read full topic

item.title: My source/client wont load re-post

item.description:
@oh_no1 wrote:

Any jdk v6 will do the job

item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

sorry i posted in the wrong section. yes, this is a rs2 client… but i needed help really bad… sorry about that.
Ok i will download jdk 6 instead… but which one? jdk v6 update 29 or 27?

Read full topic

item.title: My source/client wont load re-post
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

[b]NOTE- I HAVE JDK VERSION 7, I DOWNLOADED THE "WINDOWS X86 VERSION BUT I CHECK ON MY COMPUTER PROPERTIES AND IT SAID 64-BIT OPERATING SYSTEM. SO SHOULD I UNINSTALL THE X86 VERSION AND DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS X64 VERSION?
(http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk-7u1-download-513651.html)

  • ALSO INSTEAD OF USING WINRAR I USED WINZIP. - MY COMPUTER MANUFACTER IS TOSHIBA
    -WINDOWS EDITION : WINDOWS VISTA HOME PREMIUM[/b]

1.) ok i looked on google and found a good guide (i belive) http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/make-rsps-603179/ (not to be advatising)
ok once you looked on the site and see what i see. you will understand better. i did exactly what it said on the site except for portforwarding and doing the no-ip thingy. but i download the source testscape and i copy and paste the information provided on the site exactly on the testscape compile and runeserver. i clicked on edit and paste exactly what was on the site.
but when i did all that my source wouldnt work…
when i double click on compile this is what i get
“Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594”

this is what i edited inside of compile
“@echo off
title ArmyNation
color 3b
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\java.exe” server
pause”

2.) also i download client source “testscape” that was on the site also and when i double click on source this is what i get
“Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594”

this is what i edited inside on “runserver”
“@echo off
title ArmyNation
color 3b
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\java.exe” server
pause”

(EXCEPT NOW I EDITED SOME OF THE INFORMATION INSIDE THE SOURCE/CLIENT FILE. SO IT NOT EXACTLY THE SAME AS ON THE SITE)

PLEASE HELP!!
